# Docker ignore file
# Excludes unnecessary files from Docker build context for faster builds

# Version control
.git
.gitignore
.gitattributes

# Documentation
README.md
docs/
*.md

# Development files
.env
.env.local
.env.development
.env.test
.env.production
docker-compose.override.yml

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs and temporary files
*.log
logs/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Dependency directories
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Build artifacts
dist/
build/
coverage/

# Runtime data
pids/
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Docker files (don't include other Dockerfiles in build)
Dockerfile.*
docker-compose*.yml

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.old

# Test files
test/
tests/
__tests__/
*.test.js
*.spec.js

# CI/CD files
.github/
.gitlab-ci.yml
.travis.yml
.circleci/

# Package files
*.tar.gz
*.zip
*.rar

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/
